item.title: How to build and host a website with Hugo
item.description: This is a concise, step-by-step guide on how to build a website - just like this one - with Hugo, and host it on Github. Follow the steps and check out the hyperlinks for a quick explanation on each component. Table of Contents Link to heading I. Requirements II. Building the Website III. Hosting the Website Some explanations Link to heading Essentially, any website (and in fact most software) is just a folder with a bunch of text files “organized in a precise way”.
